channel.title: GetMotivated on Roy Tang
channel.description: Recent content in GetMotivated on Roy Tang

item.title: Reply to '[Text] You should only be doing 1 of two things: improving yourself or enjoying yourself; everything else is a waste of time' on /r/GetMotivated at https://reddit.com/r/GetMotivated/comments/7wu8gj/text_you_should_only_be_doing_1_of_two_things/:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Reply to '[Text] You should only be doing 1 of two things: improving yourself or enjoying yourself; everything else is a waste of time' on /r/GetMotivated at https://reddit.com/r/GetMotivated/comments/7wu8gj/text_you_should_only_be_doing_1_of_two_things/:

I think there’s also surviving/earning money to survive. I guess that’s not a waste of time, although I guess you could somehow include that in “improving yourself”
